fields.request: Verify release fixtures bind to active packages and sigil roots
fields.request_details:
1. Load the Sigil roots admin and confirm the ECOLL, EV, EVB, EVM, INBOX, OUTBOX, LOC, and WMI prefixes resolve to the expected models without content-type errors.
2. Visit the Package releases admin and confirm the 1.0 and 2.0 releases attach to the Arthexis package without raising fixture warnings when editing.
